h4901.definition: from {{h4900}}; a sowing; also a possession; precious, price.

h4902.definition: the same in form as {{h4901}}, but probably of foreign derivation; Meshek, a son of Japheth, and the people descended from him; Mesech, Meshech.

h4904.definition: from {{h7901}}; a bed (figuratively, a bier); abstractly, sleep; by euphemism, carnal intercourse; bed(-chamber), couch, lieth (lying) with.

h4905.definition: from {{h7919}}; instructive, i.e. a didactic poem; Maschil.

h4906.definition: from the same as {{h7906}}; a figure (carved on stone, the wall, or any object); figuratively, imagination; conceit, image(-ry), picture, × wish.

h4908.definition: from {{h7931}}; a residence (including a shepherd's hut, the lair of animals, figuratively, the grave; also the Temple); specifically, the Tabernacle (properly, its wooden walls); dwelleth, dwelling (place), habitation, tabernacle, tent.

h4909.definition: from {{h7936}}; wages or a reward; reward, wages.

h4910.definition: a primitive root; to rule; (have, make to have) dominion, governor, × indeed, reign, (bear, cause to, have) rule(-ing, -r), have power.

h4911.definition: denominative from {{h4912}}; to liken, i.e. (transitively) to use figurative language (an allegory, adage, song or the like); intransitively, to resemble; be(-come) like, compare, use (as a) proverb, speak (in proverbs), utter.

h4912.definition: apparently from {{h4910}} in some original sense of superiority in mental action; properly, a pithy maxim, usually of metaphorical nature; hence, a simile (as an adage, poem, discourse); byword, like, parable, proverb.

h4913.definition: for {{h4861}}; Mashal, a place in Palestine; Mashal.

h4915.definition: (1) from {{h4910}}; (2) from {{h4911}}; empire; a parallel; dominion, like.

h4916.definition: or מִשְׁלֹחַ; also מִשְׁלָח; from {{h7971}}; a sending out, i.e. (abstractly) presentation (favorable), or seizure (unfavorable); also (concretely) a place of dismissal, or a business to be discharged; to lay, to put, sending (forth), to set.

h4917.definition: feminine of {{h4916}}; a mission, i.e. (abstractly and favorable) release, or (concretely and unfavorable) an army; discharge, sending.

h4918.definition: from {{h7999}}; allied; Meshullam, the name of seventeen Israelites; Meshullam.

h4919.definition: plural from {{h7999}}; reconciliations; Meshillemoth, an Israelite; Meshillemoth. Compare {{h4921}}.

h4920.definition: or מְשֶׁלֶמְיָהוּ; from {{h7999}} and {{h3050}}; ally of Jah; Meshelemjah, an Israelite; Meshelemiah.

h4921.definition: from {{h7999}}; reconciliation; Meshillemith, an Israelite; Meshillemith. Compare {{h4919}}.

h4922.definition: feminine of {{h4918}}; Meshullemeth, an Israelitess; Meshullemeth.

h4923.definition: from {{h8074}}; a waste or amazement; astonishment, desolate.

h4924.definition: from {{h8080}}; fat, i.e. (literally and abstractly) fatness; but usually (figuratively and concretely) a rich dish, a fertile field, a robust man; fat (one, -ness, -test, -test place).

h4925.definition: from {{h8080}}; fatness; Mashmannah, an Israelite; Mishmannah.

h4927.definition: the same as {{h4926}}; Mishma, the name of a son of Ishmael, and of an Israelite; Mishma.

h4928.definition: feminine of {{h4926}}; audience, i.e. the royal court; also obedience, i.e. (concretely) a subject; bidding, guard, obey.

h4929.definition: from {{h8104}}; a guard (the man, the post or the prison); a deposit (figuratively); also (as observed) a usage (abstractly), or an example (concretely); diligence, guard, office, prison, ward, watch.

h4931.definition: feminine of {{h4929}}; watch, i.e. the act (custody), or (concretely) the sentry, the post; objectively preservation, or (concretely) safe; figuratively observance, i.e. (abstractly) duty or (objectively) a usage or party; charge, keep, or to be kept, office, ordinace, safeguard, ward, watch.

h4932.definition: from {{h8138}}; properly, a repetition, i.e. a duplicate (copy of a document), or a double (in amount); by implication, a second (in order, rank, age, quality or location); college, copy, double, fatlings, next, second (order), twice as much.

h4934.definition: from the same as {{h8168}}; a hollow, i.e. a narrow passage; path.

h4936.definition: apparently from {{h8159}}; inspection; Misham, an Israelite; Misham.

h4937.definition: or מִשְׁעָן; from {{h8172}}; a support (concretely), i.e. (figuratively) a protector or sustenance; stay.

h4938.definition: or מִשְׁעֶנֶת; feminine of {{h4937}}; support (abstractly), i.e. (figuratively) sustenance or (concretely) a walking-stick; staff.

h4940.definition: from {{h8192}} (compare {{h8198}}); a family, i.e. circle of relatives; figuratively, a class (of persons), a species (of animals) or sort (of things); by extension a tribe or people; family, kind(-red).

h4941.definition: from {{h8199}}; properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style; adversary, ceremony, charge, × crime, custom, desert, determination, discretion, disposing, due, fashion, form, to be judged, judgment, just(-ice, -ly), (manner of) law(-ful), manner, measure, (due) order, ordinance, right, sentence, usest, × worthy,   wrong.

h4942.definition: from {{h8192}}; a stall for cattle (only dual); burden, sheepfold.

h4943.definition: from an unused root meaning to hold; possession; steward.

h4944.definition: from {{h8264}}; a traversing, i.e. rapid motion; running to and fro.

h4945.definition: from {{h8248}}; properly, causing to drink, i.e. a butler; by implication (intransitively), drink (itself); figuratively, a well-watered region; butler(-ship), cupbearer, drink(-ing), fat pasture, watered.

h4947.definition: from {{h8259}} in its original sense of overhanging; a lintel; lintel.

h4948.definition: from {{h8254}}; weight (numerically estimated); hence, weighing (the act); (full) weight.

h4949.definition: or מִשְׁקֹלֶת; feminine of {{h4948}} or {{h4947}}; a weight, i.e. a plummet (with line attached); plummet.

h4950.definition: from {{h8257}}; a settling place (of water), i.e. a pond; deep.

h4952.definition: from {{h8281}} in the sense of loosening; maceration, i.e. steeped juice; liquor.

h4953.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h8319}}; a (musical) pipe (from its whistling sound); flute.

h4954.definition: patrial from an unused noun from an unused root; probably meaning to stretch out; extension; a Mishraite, or inhabitant (collectively) of Mishra; Mishraites.

h4955.definition: from {{h8313}}; combustion, i.e. cremation (of a corpse), or calcination (of lime); burning.

h4956.definition: from the plural of {{h4955}} and {{h4325}}; burnings of water; Misrephoth-Majim, a place in Palestine; Misrephoth-mayim.

h4957.definition: a form for {{h7796}} used denominatively; vineyard; Masrekah, a place in Idumaea; Masrekah.

h4958.definition: apparently from an unused root meaning to perforate, i.e. hollow out; a pan; pan.

h4959.definition: a primitive root; to feel of; by implication, to grope; feel, grope, search.

h4960.definition: from {{h8354}}; drink, by implication, drinking (the act); also (by implication) a banquet or (generally) feast; banquet, drank, drink, feast((-ed), -ing).

h4962.definition: from the same as {{h4970}}; properly, an adult (as of full length); by implication, a man (only in the plural); few, × friends, men, persons, × small.

h4963.definition: denominative from {{h8401}}; straw in the heap; straw.

h4964.definition: from an unused root meaning to curb; a bit; bit, bridle.

h4965.definition: from {{h4964}} and {{h520}} with the art. interposed; bit of the metropolis; Metheg-ha-Ammah, an epithet of Gath; Metheg-ammah.

h4967.definition: from {{h4962}} and {{h410}}, with the relative interposed; man who (is) of God; Methusael, an antediluvian patriarch; Methusael.

h4968.definition: from {{h4962}} and {{h7973}}; man of a dart; Methushelach, an antediluvian patriarch; Methuselah.

h4969.definition: a primitive root; to stretch out; spread out.

h4970.definition: from an unused root meaning to extend; properly, extent (of time); but used only adverbially (especially with other particle prefixes), when (either relative or interrogative); long, when.

h4971.definition: or מַתְכֻנֶת; from {{h8505}} in the transferred sense of measuring; proportion (in size, number or ingredients); composition, measure, state, tale.

h4972.definition: from {{h4100}} and {{h8513}}; what a trouble!; what a weariness.

h4973.definition: contr. from {{h3216}}; properly, a biter, i.e. a tooth; cheek (jaw) tooth, jaw.

h4974.definition: from {{h8552}}; wholesomeness; also (adverb) completely; men (by reading {{h4962}}), soundness.

h4975.definition: from an unused root meaning to be slender; properly, the waist or small of the back; only in plural the loins; greyhound, loins, side.

h4976.definition: from {{h5414}}; a present; gift, to give, reward.

h4977.definition: the same as {{h4976}}; Mattan, the name of a priest of Baal, and of an Israelite; Mattan.

h4979.definition: feminine of {{h4976}}; a present; specifically (in a good sense), a sacrificial offering, (in a bad sense) a bribe; gift.

h4980.definition: the same as {{h4979}}; Mattanah, a place in the Desert; Mattanah.

h4981.definition: probably patrial from an unused noun meaning slenderness; a Mithnite, or inhabitant of Methen; Mithnite.

h4982.definition: from {{h4976}}; liberal; Mattenai, the name of three Israelites; Mattenai.

h4983.definition: or מַתַּנְיָהוּ; from {{h4976}} and {{h3050}}; gift of Jah; Mattanjah, the name of ten Israelites; Mattaniah.

h4984.definition: from {{h5375}}; (used as abstractly) supreme exaltation; exalted.

h4985.definition: a primitive root; to suck, by implication, to relish, or (intransitively) be sweet; be (made, × take) sweet.

h4988.definition: from {{h4985}}; a dainty, i.e. (generally) food; feed sweetly.

h4989.definition: feminine of {{h4987}}; sweetness; Mithkah, a place in the Desert; Mithcah.

h4990.definition: of Persian origin; Mithredath, the name of two Persians; Mithredath.

h4991.definition: feminine of {{h4976}} abbreviated form; a present; gift.

h4992.definition: for {{h4993}}; gift of Jah; Mattattah, an Israelite; Mattathah.

h4993.definition: or מַתִּתְיָהוּ; from {{h4991}} and {{h3050}}; gift of Jah; Mattithjah, the name of four Israelites; Mattithiah. n

h4994.definition: a primitive particle of incitement and entreaty, which may usually be rendered; 'I pray', 'now', or 'then'; added mostly to verbs (in the Imperative or Future), or to interjections, occasionally to an adverb or conjunction; I beseech (pray) thee (you), go to, now, oh.

h4995.definition: apparently from {{h5106}} in the sense of harshness from refusal; properly, tough, i.e. uncooked (flesh); raw.

h4996.definition: of Egyptian origin; No (i.e. Thebes), the capital of Upper Egypt; No. Compare {{h528}}.

h4997.definition: or נאוֹדlemma נֹאוד vowel, corrected to נאוֹדxlit nôʼwd corrected to nʼôwd; also (feminine) נֹאדָה; from an unused root of uncertain signification; a (skin or leather) bag (for fluids); bottle.

h4998.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be at home, i.e. (by implication) to be pleasant (or suitable), i.e. beautiful; be beautiful, become, be comely.

h4999.definition: from {{h4998}}; a home; figuratively, a pasture; habitation, house, pasture, pleasant place.

h5000.definition: from {{h4998}} or {{h5116}}; suitable, or beautiful; becometh, comely, seemly.
